messages.msgSnippet: Hi! Wanted to share about a new website by Karen M. Gibson which features various homeschooling articles (including one from me!) It s called Leaping From the
messages.messageBody:
Hi!
Wanted to share about a new website by Karen M. Gibson which features
various homeschooling articles (including one from me!) It's called Leaping
From the Box and the home page says
> >> Articles and resources to assist home educators and homeschoolers who
>> desire to move beyond the "cookie-cutter box" mentality. Experience
>> learning and education as it should be!
The address is www.leapingfromthebox.com. It's a pretty new site and I'm sure
Karen would love to hear from other unschoolers.
Amy

Amy Kagey
E-mail me for a list of used
homeschooling books for sale!
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=462366">Shop: Usborne Books!</A>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
